        public boolean acknowledge(java.lang.String conditionId,
                  OperationParameters operationParameters,
                  java.util.Date aknTimestamp)
        Description copied from interface: AknHandler
        Perform acknowledge of monitor
        Specified by:
        acknowledge in interface AknHandler
        Parameters:
        conditionId - the monitor to acknowledge
        operationParameters - the effective operation parameters
        aknTimestamp - the timestamp until which the state is acknowledged
        Returns:
        true if the monitor was found and processed, false otherwise
